titleStmt.title: Convergence Properties of the K-Means Algorithms

analytic.title: Convergence Properties of the K-Means Algorithms

abstract.p: This paper studies the convergence properties of the well known K-Means clustering algorithm. The K-Means algorithm can be described either as a gradient descent algorithm or by slightly extending the mathematics of the EM algorithm to this hard threshold case. We show that the K-Means algorithm actually minimizes the quantization error using the very fast Newton algorithm.
